credit_line: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
title: The Ghost in the Underblows by Alfred Young Fisher
description: Pages 270-271. Left page features black text, 28 lines of poetry followed by XXIV and 7 more lines of poetry. Page number 270 in lower left corner. right page features abstract design consisting of 3 vertical registers of repetitive black and red vertical shapes. Design consists of black rectangles made of thin vertical black lines, thin black trapezoids, and red trapezoids made up of 3 rows of horizontal rectangles. Also there are lines terminating in circles and elaborated with semicircles running their length. All shapes are the same length, but fluctuate in height creating a rhythmic pattern.
name: Book
